attribute.description: It indicates whether the component should be rendered. Default : true.
attribute.name: rendered

tag.description: Renders a triggered event for a given component
tag.name: js-event

attribute.description: Indicates the component name to be achieved
attribute.name: attachTo

attribute.description: Indicates the component selector that triggers the event
attribute.name: attachToSelector

attribute.description: Indicates the javascript event to be fired
attribute.name: event

attribute.description: It indicates whether the component should be rendered. Default : true
attribute.name: rendered

tag.example: <html:input name="input1" placeholder="Focus in and focus out" /> <html:js-event attachTo="input1" event="blur"> console.log('blur'); </html:js-event>
